languages.text: "Нельзя вверять свою судьбу порождению вредоносного ксеносского разума. Впрочем, если это избавит тебя от одержимости силами Архиврага..."
"You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."
languages.original_text: "Нельзя вверять свою судьбу порождению вредоносного ксеносского разума. Впрочем, если это избавит тебя от одержимости силами Архиврага..."

languages.text: “你不该把你的命运托付给邪恶异形制造出的装置。不过，如果它可以保护你，让你不被混沌大敌的力量附身的话……”
languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

languages.text: « Vous ne pouvez pas vous fier à la création d'un esprit xénos malade. Cela dit, si cela vous protège de l'influence du Grand Ennemi... »
languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pouvez pas vous fier à la création d'un esprit xénos malade. Cela dit, si cela vous protège de l'influence du Grand Ennemi... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No puede confiar su destino a la creación de una perversa mente xenos. Pero si eso evita que la posean los poderes del Archienemigo...».
languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

traits.locale_text: «No puede confiar su destino a la creación de una perversa mente xenos. Pero si eso evita que la posean los poderes del Archienemigo...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「運命に身を委ね、悪質な異種族の精神を生み出すわけにはいかない。しかしそれで渾沌の勢力の力にとりつかれずに済むのなら…」
languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

traits.locale_text: 「運命に身を委ね、悪質な異種族の精神を生み出すわけにはいかない。しかしそれで渾沌の勢力の力にとりつかれずに済むのなら…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr könnt Euer Schicksal nicht der Schöpfung eines bösen Xenos-Verstands überlassen. Aber wenn es Euch davor bewahrt, von den Mächten des Erzfeinds ergriffen zu werden ..."
languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

languages.text: "Kaderini kötü huylu bir zenonun zihninden çıkan yaratımlarına teslim edemezsin. Tabii bunu yapmak seni Şerbaşı'nın güçlerinden koruyacaksa neden olmasın?.."
languages.original_text: "You cannot entrust your fate to the creation of a malignant xenos mind. However, if it will save you from being possessed by the Archenemy's powers..."

traits.locale_text: "Kaderini kötü huylu bir zenonun zihninden çıkan yaratımlarına teslim edemezsin. Fakat bunu yapmak, seni Şerbaşı'nın güçlerinden koruyacaksa neden olmasın?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
